content: to form cuff thread ribbon through ends of ribs at top of hat below edging rnds pull to gather top of hat and tie in bow booties/mitts make 2 of each 4 row 1 with size h hook and color a or b chain 26 for bootie or 24 for mitt half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hk and in ea chain across turn 24 half_double_crochet for bootie 22 half_double_crochet for mitt row 2 half_double_crochet in back loop only blo of ea half_double_crochet across 24 half_double_crochet for bootie 22 half_double_crochet for mitt row 3-5 repeat row 2 do not turn or fasten_off fold bootie/mitt in half so that short ends meet slip st along side of bootie/mitt to form first side seam fasten_off attach yarn to other side of bootie/mitt and slip st across to form second side seam fasten_off and weave in all ends turn seam side of bootie/mitt to inside top edging attach color c in any st on open end of bootie/mitt boy version round 1 chain 1 work 16 single_crochet evenly around top of bootie/mitt join with slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 16 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends girl version round 1 chain 1 work 16 single_crochet evenly around top of bootie/mitt join with slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet *chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends both versions weave length of 1/4 ribbon through end of rib row below top edging round pull to gather and tie in bow copyright 2008 2015 designs by kn www designsbykn com for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 5
